panel.title: CPU_ALL: Table stats pct Usage by frameID,hostname

search.query: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=CPU_ALL $frameID$ $hostname$ | eval cpu_PCT=round((Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT),2) | stats min(cpu_PCT) AS "Min % CPU usage", avg(cpu_PCT) AS "Avg % CPU usage", max(cpu_PCT) AS "Max % CPU usage", sparkline(avg(cpu_PCT)) As sparkline by frameID,hostname | eval "Avg % CPU usage"=round('Avg % CPU usage', 2) | sort frameID,hostname
